item.title: By: Janey
item.dc:creator: Janey
item.description: The "Resin Activator" is to avoid those 15 minutes. It's supposed to dry up the glue instantly :)
item.content:encoded: The “Resin Activator” is to avoid those 15 minutes. It’s supposed to dry up the glue instantly ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/asp-nail-wrap-kit/#comment-576">Alyssa</a>.
It says acetone will remove it, and you can tell that it would, but I've never had any problems with my patches coming loose. I do removals and reapplications on the same patches. I try to avoid thick layers of glitter though. Removing that would probably do some damage to the integrity of the patch.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Alyssa.

It says acetone will remove it, and you can tell that it would, but I’ve never had any problems with my patches coming loose. I do removals and reapplications on the same patches. I try to avoid thick layers of glitter though. Removing that would probably do some damage to the integrity of the patch.

item.title: By: Alyssa
item.dc:creator: Alyssa
item.description: Does the product hold up under reapplication of polish (acetone & polish)?
item.content:encoded: Does the product hold up under reapplication of polish (acetone & polish)?

item.title: By: Tisha F.
item.dc:creator: Tisha F.
item.description: Thank you so much for this post. So helpful considering the hell I put my nails through everyday as a legal secretary. I will remember this next time for sure. I don't like getting my nails "done" but I love having them look nice in a very natural way. This is a great fix for the natural look.
item.content:encoded: Thank you so much for this post. So helpful considering the hell I put my nails through everyday as a legal secretary. I will remember this next time for sure. I don’t like getting my nails “done” but I love having them look nice in a very natural way. This is a great fix for the natural look.
